attributes.action: Introduce bars/cafe's where smokers ARE allowed to smoke
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I'm tired of not having any freedom in choice in this country. It is understandable that the smoking ban is cracking down on passive smoking to non-smokers, but why do smokers have to be excluded from society completely? we want a few public places where we are allowed to smoke, instead of standing outside in the cold whenever we want a cigarette.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
